content.text: asd

This Market Guide is scheduled for publication in August 2019. It will include profiles of representative I WANNA TYPE FAST who market and sell products in a way that is consistent with our market definition. my exercise is about this thing
asdf asdfadfaa asdfasdfasdfasdfasdfsdfsdfSDA assdfasdfasdfasdfafadsfadfadfaassssssasdfaasdfasdfasdfasdf
whose products are used by corporations for this purpose;
and who have achieved some level of visibility and traction in this market.
Deadline of June 4 (we are asking for an extension) hello
Action
Date
Details
Vendor and product survey
By June 4 2019
Please use the link above to the online survey form
Note
that if we do not receive a reply within the requested time, we may need to collect data from other publicly available sources.
Factual review of draft rddddeport
By end of June 2019
Vendors will have two (2) business days to review their specific vendor write-up and Tables and respond with any factual corrections via email.
Publication on
Gartner.com
By August 2019
Courtesy copy to participating vendors
August 2019
Questionnaire - Common Questions:
Company Name:
Atlassian
Company Web Address:
https://www.atlassian.com/
Company HQ
Sydney, AU
Year founded?
Private or Public?
Public
If you represent a public company, which stock exchange(s) are you listed in?
NASDAQ: TEAM
What is the total number of full time employees currently in your organisation?
What is the total number of full time employees in your organization dedicated exclusively to the products in this market (e.g. product development, customer service, etc.)?
3,315 - We do not report on employees by product
What was your organization‘s total worldwide revenue in your last financial year? (Please provide in USD equivalent)
Our FY18 revenue was $874.0M. Our fiscal year ran from July 1, 2017 through June 30, 2018.
What was your organization‘s total worldwide revenue for the last financial year from products and services only in this market? (Please provide in USD)
We do not break down revenue by product. Atlassian’s total revenue in FY18 was $874M.
What percentage of your revenue from products in this market in the last financial year was attributable to software licenses?
Approximately 93%
What percentage of your revenue from products in this market in the last financial year was attributable to related services (excluding software licenses)?
Approximately 7% - which includes services such as training, premier support, and marketplace revenue
How did your organization‘s revenue from products in this market break down by region (please make sure the total adds to 100%)?
North America: 50%
Western Europe: 39%
Central/Eastern Europe:  N/A- Included in Western Europe
Latin America: N/A - Included in North America
Middle East/Africa: N/A- Included in Western Europe
Asia/Pacific: 11%
